title: Hunting Season
overview: Eva, 45, has recently divorced and is now afraid of losing both her son and her best friend to her exâ€™s new young, successful and brilliant sweetheart Isabel. To win back her positions, Eva goes on a road trip with her friend Marleen and Isabel, which makes the women confront different men, comical mishaps, even more comical quarrels, real hunting and most importantly themselves, forcing them to realise in the Christmas bustle what is most precious in life.
